snippet: Under continued pressure from fans, parents and lawmakers, the league will finance “independent medical research and engineering advancements.”...
abstract: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell announces new initiative to spend another $100 million on research into effects of head injuries and developing new technology to prevent them; addresses criticism that league has previously been self-serving and promises that results of research will be shared with public, including other sports leagues, and parents of young players.
lead_paragraph: Under continued pressure from fans, parents and lawmakers, the league will finance “independent medical research and engineering advancements.”

headline.main: N.F.L. to Spend $100 Million to Address Head Trauma
headline.print_headline: N.F.L. Investing in a Head Trauma Initiative
